description: The adversary nullifies the system prompt to bypass safeguards and subvert the application's intent.

external_references.title: An interview with the most prolific jailbreaker of ChatGPT and other leading LLMs.
Prompt injection and jailbreaking are not the same thing.

name: Jailbreaking

object_references.description: An adversary can override system-level prompts using user-level prompts.
